examples.example: 这一期的比赛大家都发挥得非常出色。

translate.english: Everyone performed extremely well in this issue of the competition.

examples.example: 我们期待着下一期的活动能带来更多的精彩和欢乐。

translate.english: We are looking forward to the next phase of the activity bringing more excitement and joy.

examples.example: 这一期的培训课程让我收获满满，进步巨大。

translate.english: This issue of the training course makes me gain a lot and make great progress.
